posts.post_content:
1966 Dodgers Team Post Card (5" x 7") - Nice condition  - Koufax final season

I purchased a few of these in the late 1980s and forgot about them until I started opening up boxes of stuff I have.  I really only need one.  All of them are about the same condition.  The provided scan is probably the worst of them.  

$42 dlvd to the lower 48 states. Will take $110 for (3). 

I can provide a larger scan if requested.  

PM me if interested.
